articles.title: UFC 321: The greatest heavyweight is‚Ä¶ + Throwing in the towel [FULL SHOW] | Good Guy / Bad Guy
articles.description: On this episode of Good Guy / Bad Guy‚Ä¶Will UFC 321 decide who the greatest heavyweight is when Tom Aspinall puts his title on the line against Ciryl Gane? Or will another name be making headlines when it‚Äôs all said and done? You do not want to miss what the guys think Monday‚Äôs headline will be. Then, the women‚Äôs strawweight belt is up for grabs in the co-main event. And it‚Äôs a rematch five years in the making when Virna Jandiroba takes on Mackenzie Dern. But does their first fight even matter once that Octagon door closes? Plus, to throw in the towel or not throw in the towel? That is the question when it comes to Reiner de Ridder and the decision to save him from being mauled by Brendan Allen in the fifth round last week in Vancouver. Find out if the Good Guy or Bad Guy believe it was the right decision and if it changes RDR‚Äôs aura moving forward. #ESPN #MMA #UFC ‚úî For more UFC, sign up for ESPN+ http://espnplus.com/ufc/youtube ‚úî Get the ESPN App: http://www.espn.com/espn/apps/espn ‚úî Subscribe to ESPN on YouTube: http://es.pn/SUBSCRIBEtoYOUTUBE ‚úî Subscribe to ESPN FC on YouTube: http://bit.ly/SUBSCRIBEtoESPNFC ‚úî Subscribe to NBA on ESPN on YouTube: http://bit.ly/SUBSCRIBEtoNBAonESPN ‚úî Watch ESPN on YouTube TV: http://es.pn/YouTubeTV

articles.title: Are we Overestimating Tom Aspinall?
articles.description: Don‚Äôt miss out on all the action this week at DraftKings! Download the DraftKings app today! Sign-up using https://dkng.co/sonnen or through my promo code SONNEN Tom Aspinall has looked unstoppable ‚Äî quick finishes, world-class composure, and elite athleticism. But are we overestimating him? Chael Sonnen breaks down why fans may be jumping ahead of the story. With Jon Jones sidelined, the heavyweight division‚Äôs wide open ‚Äî but how much of Aspinall‚Äôs hype comes from timing, and how much comes from talent? Before crowning him the next great heavyweight, Chael says we need to see what happens with Gane vs. Aspinall, Jones vs. Miocic, and how the division resets in 2025. #TomAspinall #ChaelSonnen #UFCHeavyweight #JonJones #CirylGane #UFCLondon #MMA #UFCNews Bad Guy Inc merch now available at https://BadGuyInc.com Click here to subscribe: https://bit.ly/3FrHIPK Follow me on IG: https://bit.ly/3HY7BIE Follow me on Twitter: https://bit.ly/3tvY5J7 All things UFC and MMA with the undefeated Bad Guy, Chael Sonnen. articles.title: Daniel Cormier REACTS to Brendan Allen TKO win vs. Reinier de Ridder, Holland-Malott | UFC Vancouver
articles.description: Daniel Cormier IS LIVE from Vancouver, Canada to give his INSTANT REACTION from octagon side after an IMPRESSIVE TKO win for Brendan Allen over Reinier de Ridder. DC breaks down de Ridder's decision to tap out of the fight in between rounds, and sheds light on the MASSIVE IMPACT this will have on Allen's career going forward. Plus, Cormier breaks down Mike Malott's controversial win over Kevin Holland and Marlon Chito Vera's split decision loss to Aiemann Zahabi. And don't miss DC's reaction to Mono Fiorot's INCREDIBLE KNOCKOUT WIN and Charles Jourdain's submission victory! All lines provided by @hardrockbet Follow me on all social media platforms!
